lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid will "lose leadership" while influential defender Diego Godin is absent from their next three games with a hamstring injury, coach Diego Simeone said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Atletico Will Suffer From Godin Absence, Says Simeone
headline.main: Atletico Will Suffer From Godin Absence, Says Simeone

snippet: Atletico Madrid will "lose leadership" while influential defender Diego Godin is absent from their next three games with a hamstring injury, coach Diego Simeone said on Friday....
